Prerequisites.title: Prerequisites
Prerequisites.text: AMH 2010 and AMH 2020, or EUH 2000 and EUH 2001, or WOH 2012 and WOH 2022.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Historical changes and continuities in experiences of Chinese women during the traditional period, the modern era and contemporary times.

ASH3302 - History of Modern East Asia.name: ASH3302 - History of Modern East Asia

Prerequisites.title: Prerequisites
Prerequisites.text: Grade of 'C' (2.0) or better in ENC 1102, or C.I.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Historical experiences in East Asia (China, Japan, Korea) from 1600 to the present.

ASH3244 - History of the Kurds in the Mi.name: ASH3244 - History of the Kurds in the Middle East

Prerequisites.title: Prerequisites
Prerequisites.text: Grade of 'C' (2.0) or better in ENC 1102, or CI.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: The political history of the Kurds in the Middle East, including the evolution of Kurdish identity and nationalism.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Modern Iraqi history through a set of interrelated monographic studies that focus on the political and legal components of the Iraqi state.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: History of the Ottoman Empire from its origins in the 13th century to its collapse after WWI.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Political, social, economic, and cultural transformations undergone by China from about the 17th century to the present.

ASH4324 - History & Culture of South Asi.name: ASH4324 - History & Culture of South Asia

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: History and culture of South Asia from prehistory to decline of the British Raj.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: History of Japan from the end of the Tokugawa period to the present day.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: History of India from decline of Mughlas in late 18th century to present.

ASH4383 - Imperialism & Decolonization i.name: ASH4383 - Imperialism & Decolonization in South Asia

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Socio-cultural, economic and political impact of imperialism and the subsequent decolonization in South Asia.

Prerequisites.title: Prerequisites
Prerequisites.text: EUH 2000 and EUH 2001, or WOH 2012 and WOH 2022.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Chinese history from its pre-historical genesis until the 18th century.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: History of the Middle East and North Africa from the birth of Islam to the 16th century.

Prerequisites.title: Prerequisites
Prerequisites.text: PR: Grade of C (2.0) or better required in ENC 1102 or equivalent, or C.I.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Political histories and social developments that arose in Iraq, Syria, and Turkey at the dawn of human history.

Prerequisites.title: Prerequisites
Prerequisites.text: EUH 2000 or WOH 2012 or WOH 2012H, or C.I.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: History of the world's first literate societies (i.e. Mesopotamia, Egypt, the Levant) focusing upon their primary sources (in translation).

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: History of the Middle East and North Africa from the 16th century to the present.
